title: BioWerkstatt
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Health food shop with a daily vegan lunch menu consisting of a main dish and a soup. Also has non-vegan veggie quiche, organic cake, different salads on offer. Small sitting area in the shop. Organic juices and mineral water for only approx. 0,50â‚¬ including as many refills as wanted. The shop features a wide range of fresh fruit and vegetables and other organic products. Non smoking. Previously named Bioladen Gruner Baum.
